attributes.action: Declare EU referendum void, due to campaign promises now admitted as lies
attributes.additional_details:
NHS lie admitted:
http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/682979/Nigel-Farage-NHS
http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/26/eu-referendum-brexit-vote-leave-iain-duncan-smith-nhs

Immigration lie admitted:
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/brexit-immigration-uk-nigel-evans-eu-referendum-latest-news-what-will-happen-migrants-a7104021.html
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3659802/
attributes.background:
Since the EU referendum, many of the Leave campaign promises have been admitted to be lies. For example: giving the NHS an extra £350 million a week; and reducing immigration.
We therefore call upon the government to declare the EU referendum null and void.
